alert.note: Alert for Florence; Forest (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued May 01 at 2:34PM CDT until May 02 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM CDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Wet snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches, mainly near the Upper Michigan border. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Florence and Forest Counties. * WHEN...Until 1 AM CDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult at times. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday evening commute. The combination of strong winds and wet snow could lead to downed tree limbs and isolated power outages.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
